products.title: Stockholm Duck Egg Roller Blind
products.description: Their stockholm duck egg roller blind is a beautiful light blue, green colour. So subtle in colour it works perfectly with natural and wooden tones throughout the home. The fabric is moisture restitance making it a 'go to' for kitchens and bathrooms. This lovely, blue blind also comes with 5 year guarantee as standard, giving you peace of mind that you blind is built to last. A firm favourite, their oslo blackout fabrics come in a wide array of colours and blind types to suit any room - whether its blackout roller blinds in the bedroom, in the kitchen or study, these blackout fabrics are durable and value for money. Their roller blinds are expertly cut and assembled by their roller blinds team, with over 50 years of making blinds and curtains, not only do their blinds come with a quality finish, we provide a free five year guarantee on this product.

products.title: Screenview Black/black Roller Blind

This black roller blind is perfect for blocking out the heat and harmful uv rays from your room, keeping the core room temperature down, a must for any modern environment. These magic screen blinds ensure you can still see outside but don't let anybody outside see in.
